text: 3:12: Dng 21:2; Aij 62:2; 65:15 Gu ne hanyie è yangpho shii ne guro Hamangkhung-aphuii ro Jewthek misiahò pha sarongthek rab ruii phro, chiih-è ithek ne khuchungde athoh phro. Gu ne ithek lakhung shii guro Hamangkhung-aphuii ro ibeng zey pha ro chiih-è nyie yi guro Hamangkhung-aphuii pha hamangkhung re-è buzam wuii ruii pha, iwo Jerusalem, guro Hamangkhung-aphuii pha rajan beng zey pha ro. Gu ne ithek lakhung shii guro iwo ibeng de zey ruii phro.
